glosses: Used to represent a person, thing, event, situation etc. as lesser than what they seem or what they are; just, only

examples.text:
Altı üstü beş metreydi
Dertlerinin birikimi
Belki “Biter” dedin ama
Sen kaparsan gözlerini
examples.translation:
It was just five meters
The sum of your problems
Maybe you said “It would end”, but
If you close your eyes
